title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the output location and classpath separately, an error message appears stating 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are treated as separate operations, causing an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation. Similar to the validation process for checking classpath and output location together, the setting of classpath and output location should be offered as a single operation. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
